name: Life (Maxximus18)
description:
Summary-

The first thing you might wonder is that.... your dead.
You are wandering your old room looking at a book you find on your table somehow
that might give you a second chance at life :D.

Be prepared for some difficult platforming to earn your new chance at life.
You can also just float around your room.

WASD- Movement for floating around

A and D for the platforming movement section
Space- Jump
Use mouseclick for menu buttons.

E for interacting with the enviorment.

- This is a submission for BrackeysGameJam 2023
